title: Results
text:
Code
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly.express as px

# PLOT
df = df.sort_values(by = 'secular')
fig = px.bar(df,y=df.iloc[:,0],x="secular", orientation='h')
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=9, y1=18, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.1,
        annotation_text="Secular", annotation_position="top left",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=9, y1=-1, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.1,
        annotation_text="Traditional", annotation_position="bottom right",
        )

fig.show()




                                                
Figure 1: ?(caption)








Code
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly.express as px

# PLOT
df = df.sort_values(by = 'self_expression')
fig = px.bar(df.sort_values(by = 'self_expression'),y=df.iloc[:,0],x="self_expression", orientation='h')
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=9, y1=18, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.1,
        annotation_text="Self Expression", annotation_position="top left",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=9, y1=-1, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.1,
        annotation_text="Survival", annotation_position="bottom right",
        )

fig.show()




                                                
Figure 2: ?(caption)

title: Results
text:
2.1 Country wise


Code
grp_country_yr = pd.read_csv('grp_country_yr.csv')
fig = px.line(grp_country_yr[grp_country_yr['country'].isin(select_country)]
        , x="year", y="secular"
        , hover_name= 'country'             
        , color='country',markers=True, title='Please Select Countries'
        )

fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Secular", annotation_position="top",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=-1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Traditional", annotation_position="bottom",
        )
fig.update_traces(visible='legendonly')
fig.show()


fig = px.line(grp_country_yr[grp_country_yr['country'].isin(select_country)]
        , x="year", y="self_expression"
        , hover_name= 'country' 
        , color='country',markers=True, title='Please Select Countries'
        )

import plotly.graph_objects as go

fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="self_expression", annotation_position="top",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=-1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Survival", annotation_position="bottom",
        )
fig.update_traces(visible='legendonly')
fig.show()

title: Results
text:
2.2 By Sex


Code
grp_country_age_sex_yr = pd.read_csv('grp_country_age_sex_yr.csv')
fig = px.line(grp_country_age_sex_yr[grp_country_age_sex_yr['country'].isin(select_country)]
        , x="year", y="secular"
        , hover_name= 'country'             
        , color='country',markers=True, title='Please Select Countries'
        , facet_col = 'sex')

fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Secular", annotation_position="top",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=-1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Traditional", annotation_position="bottom",
        )
fig.update_traces(visible='legendonly')
fig.show()


fig = px.line(grp_country_age_sex_yr[grp_country_age_sex_yr['country'].isin(select_country)]
        , x="year", y="self_expression"
        , hover_name= 'country' 
        , color='country',markers=True, title='Please Select Countries'
        , facet_col = 'sex')

import plotly.graph_objects as go

fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="self_expression", annotation_position="top",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=-1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Survival", annotation_position="bottom",

fig.update_traces(visible='legendonly')

title: Results
text:
2.3 By Age Group


Code
grp_country_age_yr = pd.read_csv('grp_country_age_yr.csv')
fig = px.line(grp_country_age_yr[grp_country_age_yr['country'].isin(select_country)]
        , x="year", y="secular"
        , hover_name= 'country'             
        , color='country',markers=True, title='Please Select Countries'
        , facet_col = 'age')

fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Secular", annotation_position="top",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=-1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Traditional", annotation_position="bottom",
        )
        
fig.update_traces(visible='legendonly')
fig.show()


fig = px.line(grp_country_age_yr[grp_country_age_yr['country'].isin(select_country)]
        , x="year", y="self_expression"
        , hover_name= 'country' 
        , color='country',markers=True, title='Please Select Countries'
        , facet_col = 'age')

import plotly.graph_objects as go

fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="green", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="self_expression", annotation_position="top",
        )
fig.add_hrect(
        y0=0, y1=-1.5, line_width=0, 
        fillcolor="red", opacity=0.05,
        annotation_text="Survival", annotation_position="bottom",
        )
fig.update_traces(visible='legendonly')
fig.show()
